mapper.select: select t3.amount spendTotal from (SELECT SUM(amount) amount FROM tb_record_detail t1 LEFT JOIN tb_spend_category t2 on t1.spend_category_id = t2.id where t1.user_id = #{userId} and t2.record_type_id = (select id from tb_record_type where code = #{recordTypeCode}) and date_format(t1.occur_time, '%Y-%m') = date_format(#{date}, '%Y-%m') and t1.delete_time is null ) t3

SELECT t1.spend_category_id spendCategoryId,t2.name spendCategoryName,SUM(amount) total FROM tb_record_detail t1 LEFT JOIN tb_spend_category t2 on t1.spend_category_id = t2.id where t1.user_id = #{userId} and t2.record_type_id = (select id from tb_record_type where code = #{recordTypeCode}) and date_format(t1.occur_time, '%Y-%m') = date_format(#{date}, '%Y-%m') and t1.delete_time is null group by t1.spend_category_id ORDER BY total desc LIMIT #{begin},#{end}

select t1.*, t2.name spendCategoryName, t2.code spendCagegoryCode from tb_record_detail t1 LEFT JOIN tb_spend_category t2 on t2.id = t1.spend_category_id where t1.user_id = #{userId} and t2.record_type_id = (select id from tb_record_type where code = #{recordTypeCode}) and date_format(t1.occur_time, '%Y-%m') = date_format(#{date}, '%Y-%m') and t1.delete_time is null ORDER BY t1.occur_time asc LIMIT #{begin},#{end}

select t1.amount amount, t1.occur_time occurTime, t2.name spendCategoryName, t2.code spendCagegoryCode from tb_record_detail t1 LEFT JOIN tb_spend_category t2 on t2.id = t1.spend_category_id where t1.user_id = #{userId} and t2.record_type_id = (select id from tb_record_type where code = #{recordTypeCode}) and date_format(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m') > date_format(t1.occur_time, '%Y-%m') and date_format(t1.occur_time, '%Y-%m') >= date_format(#{beginDate}, '%Y-%m') and t1.delete_time is null ORDER BY t1.occur_time asc
